A [93mcomprehensive[0m [93manalysis[0m of the [93mpresented[0m [93mconcept[0m was [93mexecuted[0m through [93mevaluation[0m of [93mdata[0m [93macquired[0m through a [93mmultivariate[0m [93mstrategy[0m [93minvolving[0m [93misothermal[0m [93mtitration[0m [93mcalorimetry[0m, [93mcrystallography[0m, [93mspectroscopy[0m, and [93mtheoretical[0m [92mmodeling[0m on the [93mexample[0m of [93mactinide[0m-[93mcontaining[0m [93mcompounds[0m [93mbased[0m on [93mthorium[0m([93miv[0m)-, and [93muranium[0m([93miv[0m, [93mvi[0m), as [93mwell[0m as [93mtransuranic[0m [93melements[0m [93msuch[0m as [93mplutonium[0m([93miv[0m) in [93msolution[0m and within a [93mmetal[0m-[93morganic[0m [92mframework[0m ([93mMOF[0m) [93mmatrix[0m for the [93mfirst[0m [93mtime[0m. [93mOverall[0m, the [93mpresented[0m [93mconcept[0m [93mcould[0m [93musher[0m in an [93malternative[0m [93mdirection[0m in [93mstimuli[0m-[93mresponsive[0m [93mactinide[0m-[93mbased[0m [92mplatforms[0m that [93mcould[0m be [93madapted[0m to [93mconfront[0m [93mcurrent[0m and [93mupcoming[0m [93mchallenges[0m in [93mf[0m-[93mblock[0m [93mchemistry[0m.
